ProjectTitle: Synthesis of sequence-defined conjugated macromolecules for nonlinear optics
InitialFeedbackHistory: 14/02/2025 [REDACTED] will you use samples/materials? Please note that these are considered physical data within the context of a DMP, please add these in the table.
